meanings.definition: A type of edible lobster found in European waters.
meanings.sent1: The langoustes were delicious when cooked with butter.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a plate of langoustes at the seafood restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The langoustes decided to have a party in the lobster pot.
meanings.sent4: The langoustes in the dish danced with the flavors on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The langoustes, with their bright red shells, looked stunning on the plate.

meanings.definition: The flesh of this lobster used as food.
meanings.sent1: She savored the langoustes with every bite.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicious dish using langoustes.
meanings.sent3: The langoustes in the stew whispered stories of the sea to the vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The langoustes on the platter were a feast for the eyes before the stomach.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the langoustes cooking filled the kitchen with a mouth-watering scent.
